tier.item: (13) Er will jemandem schmeicheln, aber sie wissen nicht, {wem / *wen}.
he wants someone flatter but they know not who / who
dat dat acc
`He wants to flatter someone, but they don't know who.'

he wants someone dat flatter but they know not who dat / who acc
`He wants to flatter someone, but they don't know who.'

he wants someone dat flatter but they know not who dat / who acc
He wants to flatter someone, but they don't know who.

he wants someone praise but they know not who / who
acc dat acc

he wants someone acc praise but they know not who dat / who acc

they know the answer / the answer not
dat acc
`They don't know the answer.'

they know the answer dat / the answer acc not
`They don't know the answer.'

they know the answer dat / the answer acc not

(16) a. Kapjos irthe, alla dhe ksero {pjos / *pjon}.
someone came, but not know.1sg who / whom
nom acc
`Someone came, but I don't know who.'

(20) Er meinte, er hätte geholfen, aber wir wüßten nicht, {wem / *wen}.
he thought he had.SUBJ helped but we knew.SUBJ not who / who
dat acc
`He claims he helped, but we wouldn't be able to say who.'
